body_html:
I don't think this is a very intuitive extension to the API. Why is it considering uniqueness only in some subset of the dimensions (i.e. 1, 2) but not in 0. I'd expect unique to do something like return
[[0,0,0]]. In any case, we are trying to adhere to NumPy as much as possible which does not have this.

body:
I don't think this is a very intuitive extension to the API. Why is it considering uniqueness only in some subset of the dimensions (i.e. 1, 2) but not in 0. I'd expect unique to do something like return
[[0,0,0]]. In any case, we are trying to adhere to NumPy as much as possible which does not have this.
